Getting Started with Howth

Published on 2024-01-15 by Alice

Learn how to get started with Howth, the fast JavaScript runtime.

Installation

First, build Howth from source:

``bash cargo build --features native-runtime -p fastnode-cli `

Running Your First Script

Create a file called hello.js:

`javascript console.log('Hello, Howth!'); `

Then run it:

`bash howth run --native hello.js ``

That's it! You're now running JavaScript with Howth.
